string.text: Aging System Tweak
Pregnancy Setting
Child Becoming Hero Age
The age at which kids of Calradia become a playable hero. Recommend setting to a value greater than 14. Otherwise sometimes NPCs will spawn as small kids
Max Age
Set the maximum age a character in Calradia could possibly live. Everyone in Calradia will die after reaching this age
How many days your child grows at
How many days your children need to grow one year older. In Native 1 year is 84 days
Enable NPC Children Faster Growth
If enabled, NPC's children will grow at the same rate as your children
Growth Boost Stop Age
The age after which your children will stop growing any faster. After this age, your children return to normal growth rate(1 year older per year)
Duration of Pregnancy(Days)
The number of days from a woman's conception to the birth of child in all Calradia . Native value is 36
Disable Maternal Mortality(All Character)
If enabled, all female characters in Calradia will never die of dystocia. In native female characters might die when giving birth to a child
Still Birth Probability
The probability of all kids in Calradia dying of stillbirth. Native value is 0.01. Set to 0 to disable, set to 1.0 to kill every child at birth
Max Pregnant Age
The maximum age for all female characters to get pregnant in Calradia. Native Value is 45
Min Pregnant Age
The minimum age for all female characters to get pregnant in Calradia. Native Value is 18
Main Hero's Clan Pregnancy Probability
The pregnancy probability of heros in the main character's clan. Setting to 0 means your clan members will no longer have any more children. Native value is close to 1.0
